verses.verse: Now Korah <S%H7141><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Izhar <S%H3324><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, with Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram <S%H48><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab <S%H446><s%>, and On <S%H203><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Peleth <S%H6431><s%>, sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, took men <S%H3947><s%>:

and they rose up <S%H6965><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, with certain <S%H582><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> princes <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, called <S%H7148><s%> to the assembly <S%H5712><s%>, men <S%H582><s%> of renown <S%H8034><s%>;

and they assembled themselves together <S%H6950><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H7227><s%>, Ye take too much upon you <S%H5712><s%>, seeing all the congregation are holy <S%H6918><s%>, every one of them <S%H3068><s%>, and Jehovah is among <S%H8432><s%> them <S%H5375><s%>: wherefore then lift ye up yourselves above the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>?
And when Moses <S%H4872><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it <S%H5307><s%>, he fell upon his face <S%H6440><s%>:

and he spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Korah <S%H7141><s%> and unto all his company <S%H5712><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, In the morning <S%H1242><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will show <S%H3045><s%> who are his <S%H6918><s%>, and who is holy, and will cause him to come near <S%H7126><s%> unto him <S%H977><s%>: even him whom he shall choose will he cause to come near unto him <S%H7126><s%>.
This do <S%H6213><s%>: take <S%H3947><s%> you censers <S%H4289><s%>, Korah <S%H7141><s%>, and all his company <S%H5712><s%>;

and put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in them <S%H2004><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> upon them before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> to-morrow <S%H4279><s%>: and it shall be that the man <S%H376><s%> whom Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> doth choose <S%H977><s%>, he shall be holy <S%H6918><s%>: ye take too much <S%H7227><s%> upon you <S%H1121><s%>, ye sons of Levi <S%H3878><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Korah <S%H7141><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> now <S%H1121><s%>, ye sons of Levi <S%H3878><s%>:

seemeth it but a small thing <S%H4592><s%> unto you <S%H430><s%>, that the God of Israel <S%H3478><s%> hath separated <S%H914><s%> you from the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, to bring you near <S%H7126><s%> to himself <S%H5647><s%>, to do the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and to stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> to minister unto them <S%H8334><s%>;

and that he hath brought thee near <S%H7126><s%>, and all thy brethren <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> with thee <S%H1245><s%>? and seek ye the priesthood also <S%H3550><s%>?

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thou and all thy company <S%H5712><s%> are gathered together <S%H3259><s%> against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: and Aaron <S%H175><s%>, what is he that ye murmur against him <S%H3885><s%>?

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to call <S%H7121><s%> Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram <S%H48><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliab <S%H446><s%>; and they said <S%H559><s%>, We will not come up <S%H5927><s%>:

is it a small thing <S%H4592><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> thou hast brought us up <S%H5927><s%> out of a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>, to kill <S%H4191><s%> us in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, but thou must needs make <S%H8323><s%> thyself also <S%H8323><s%> a prince over us <S%H8323><s%>?

Moreover <S%H637><s%> thou hast not brought <S%H935><s%> us into a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>, nor given <S%H5414><s%> us inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of fields <S%H7704><s%> and vineyards <S%H3754><s%>: wilt thou put out <S%H5365><s%> the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of these men <S%H582><s%>? we will not come up <S%H5927><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> wroth <S%H2734><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Respect <S%H6437><s%> not thou their offering <S%H4503><s%>: I have not taken <S%H5375><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ass <S%H2543><s%> from them <S%H7489><s%>, neither have I hurt one of them <S%H259><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Korah <S%H7141><s%>, Be thou and all thy company <S%H5712><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, thou <S%H175><s%>, and they, and Aaron, to-morrow <S%H4279><s%>:

and take <S%H3947><s%> ye every man <S%H376><s%> his censer <S%H4289><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> upon them <S%H7126><s%>, and bring ye before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his censer <S%H4289><s%>, two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> censers <S%H4289><s%>; thou also <S%H175><s%>, and Aaron, each <S%H376><s%> his censer <S%H4289><s%>.

And they took <S%H3947><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his censer <S%H4289><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in them <S%H7760><s%>, and laid incense <S%H7004><s%> thereon <S%H5975><s%>, and stood at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> with Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%>.

And Korah <S%H7141><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> against them unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>: and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto all the congregation <S%H5712><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> and unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Separate <S%H914><s%> yourselves from among <S%H8432><s%> this congregation <S%H5712><s%>, that I may consume <S%H3615><s%> them in a moment <S%H7281><s%>.

And they fell <S%H5307><s%> upon their faces <S%H6440><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, O God <S%H410><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of the spirits <S%H7307><s%> of all flesh <S%H1320><s%>, shall one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> sin <S%H2398><s%>, and wilt thou be wroth <S%H7107><s%> with all the congregation <S%H5712><s%>?
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Get you up <S%H5927><s%> from about <S%H5439><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of Korah <S%H7141><s%>, Dathan <S%H1885><s%>, and Abiram <S%H48><s%>.
And Moses rose up <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> unto Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram <S%H48><s%>; and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> followed <S%H3212><s%> him <S%H310><s%>.

And he spake <S%H1696><s%> unto the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Depart <S%H5493><s%>, I pray you <S%H168><s%>, from the tents of these wicked <S%H7563><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, and touch <S%H5060><s%> nothing of theirs <S%H5595><s%>, lest ye be consumed in all their sins <S%H2403><s%>.

So they gat them up <S%H5927><s%> from the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of Korah <S%H7141><s%>, Dathan <S%H1885><s%>, and Abiram <S%H48><s%>, on every side <S%H5439><s%>: and Dathan <S%H1885><s%> and Abiram <S%H48><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%>, and stood <S%H5324><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of their tents <S%H168><s%>, and their wives <S%H802><s%>, and their sons <S%H1121><s%>, and their little ones <S%H2945><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Hereby ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath sent <S%H7971><s%> me to do <S%H6213><s%> all these works <S%H4639><s%>; for I have not done them of mine own mind <S%H3820><s%>.

If these men die <S%H4191><s%> the common death <S%H4194><s%> of all men <S%H120><s%>, or if they be visited <S%H6485><s%> after the visitation <S%H6486><s%> of all men <S%H120><s%>; then Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath not sent me <S%H7971><s%>.

But if Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> make <S%H1254><s%> a new thing <S%H1278><s%>, and the ground <S%H127><s%> open <S%H6475><s%> its mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and swallow them up <S%H1104><s%>, with all that appertain unto them <S%H3381><s%>, and they go down alive <S%H2416><s%> into Sheol <S%H7585><s%>; then ye shall understand <S%H3045><s%> that these men <S%H582><s%> have despised <S%H5006><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
And it came to pass <S%H3615><s%>, as he made an end of speaking <S%H1696><s%> all these words <S%H1697><s%>, that the ground <S%H127><s%> clave asunder that was under them <S%H1234><s%>;

and the earth <S%H776><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> its mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and swallowed them up <S%H1104><s%>, and their households <S%H1004><s%>, and all the men <S%H120><s%> that appertained unto Korah <S%H7141><s%>, and all their goods <S%H7399><s%>.

So they <S%H3381><s%>, and all that appertained to them, went down alive <S%H2416><s%> into Sheol <S%H7585><s%>: and the earth <S%H776><s%> closed <S%H3680><s%> upon them <S%H6><s%>, and they perished from among <S%H8432><s%> the assembly <S%H6951><s%>.

And all Israel <S%H3478><s%> that were round about <S%H5439><s%> them fled <S%H5127><s%> at the cry <S%H6963><s%> of them <S%H559><s%>; for they said, Lest the earth <S%H776><s%> swallow us up <S%H1104><s%>.

And fire <S%H784><s%> came forth <S%H3318><s%> from Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and devoured <S%H398><s%> the two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> men <S%H376><s%> that offered <S%H7126><s%> the incense <S%H7004><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H559><s%> unto Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, that he take up <S%H7311><s%> the censers <S%H4289><s%> out <S%H996><s%> of the burning <S%H8316><s%>, and scatter <S%H2219><s%> thou the fire <S%H784><s%> yonder <S%H1973><s%>; for they are holy <S%H6942><s%>,

even the censers <S%H4289><s%> of these sinners <S%H2400><s%> against their own lives <S%H5315><s%>; and let them be made <S%H6213><s%> beaten <S%H7555><s%> plates <S%H6341><s%> for a covering <S%H6826><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>: for they offered <S%H7126><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; therefore they are holy <S%H6942><s%>; and they shall be a sign <S%H226><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the brazen <S%H5178><s%> censers <S%H4289><s%>, which they that were burnt <S%H8313><s%> had offered <S%H7126><s%>; and they beat <S%H7554><s%> them out for a covering <S%H6826><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>,

to be a memorial <S%H2146><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, to the end that <S%H834><s%> no stranger <S%H376><s%>, that is not of the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%>, come near <S%H7126><s%> to burn <S%H6999><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; that he be not as Korah <S%H7141><s%>, and as his company <S%H5712><s%>: as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto him by <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

But on the morrow <S%H4283><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against Aaron <S%H175><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Ye have killed <S%H4191><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H5712><s%>, when the congregation was assembled <S%H6950><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against Aaron <S%H175><s%>, that they looked <S%H6437><s%> toward the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>: and <S%H6051><s%>, behold, the cloud covered <S%H3680><s%> it <S%H3519><s%>, and the glory of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to the front <S%H6440><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Get you up <S%H7426><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> this congregation <S%H5712><s%>, that I may consume <S%H3615><s%> them in a moment <S%H7281><s%>. And they fell <S%H5307><s%> upon their faces <S%H6440><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, Take <S%H3947><s%> thy censer <S%H4289><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> therein from off <S%H6440><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and lay <S%H7760><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> thereon <S%H3212><s%>, and carry it quickly <S%H4120><s%> unto the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, and make atonement <S%H3722><s%> for them <S%H7110><s%>: for there is wrath gone out <S%H3318><s%> from Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; the plague <S%H5063><s%> is begun <S%H2490><s%>.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%>, and ran <S%H7323><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the assembly <S%H6951><s%>; and <S%H5063><s%>, behold, the plague was begun <S%H2490><s%> among the people <S%H5971><s%>: and he put <S%H5414><s%> on the incense <S%H7004><s%>, and made atonement <S%H3722><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%>.
And he stood <S%H5975><s%> between the dead <S%H4191><s%> and the living <S%H2416><s%>; and the plague <S%H4046><s%> was stayed <S%H6113><s%>.

Now they that died <S%H4191><s%> by the plague <S%H4046><s%> were fourteen <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>, besides them that died <S%H4191><s%> about the matter <S%H1697><s%> of Korah <S%H7141><s%>.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>: and the plague <S%H4046><s%> was stayed <S%H6113><s%>.
